import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import _HeaderMovieDetails from './_HeaderMovieDetails'; import _HeaderMovieCast from './_HeaderMovieCast'; import shaw from '../../Static/Images/shaw.png'; import narcos from '../../Static/Images/narcos.png' import { Button, Container, Menu, Responsive, Segment, Visibility, Grid, Divider, Image, Header, Embed, Search, Icon, Dropdown, Label } from 'semantic-ui-react' const _Header = ({ Imagess }) => { const [bgColor, setBgColor] = useState('#111111'); const [width, setWidth] = useState(window.innerWidth); return (


{Imagess.name}

{Imagess.desc}

) } export default _Header;
